abstract: Chevrolet is using vintage pictures to mark its 100th anniversary in a commercial that is to be introduced during the first game of the 2011 World Series.
snippet: Chevrolet is using vintage pictures to mark its 100th anniversary in a commercial that is to be introduced during the first game of the 2011 World Series.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: 2:06 p.m. | Updated The Chevrolet division of General Motors is turning to television to mark its 100th anniversary with a commercial that is to be introduced on Wednesday night during the first game of the 2011 World Series on Fox Broadcasting.

headline.main: Chevy Turns to Pictures to Celebrate a Centennial
